nested_items.name: Exports
nested_items.description: The details of the exports, including name and export status.

nested_items.name: ExportArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for this export.

nested_items.name: ExportName
nested_items.description: The name of this specific data export.

nested_items.name: ExportStatus
nested_items.description: The status of this specific data export.

nested_items.name: CreatedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the export was created.

nested_items.name: LastRefreshedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the export was last generated.

nested_items.name: LastUpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the export was updated.

nested_items.name: StatusCode
nested_items.description: The status code for the request.

nested_items.name: StatusReason
nested_items.description: The description for the status code.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token to retrieve the next set of results.
